languages.text: "Ты, {name}..." {n}Маражай, кажется, едва сдерживается, чтобы не дотронуться до вас — его глаза, полные неизбывной одержимости, жадно смотрят на вас в упор.{/n} "Чувствуешь ли ты этот жар? Это разрывающее изнутри пламя? Эту неутолимую жажду, на мгновение напоенную морем крови? Ты... довол{mf|ен|ьна} мной?"

"You, {name}..." {n}Marazhai can hardly stop himself from reaching out for you — his eyes, full of unrelenting obsession, devour you at close range.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"
languages.original_text: "Ты, {name}..." {n}Маражай, кажется, едва сдерживается, чтобы не дотронуться до вас — его глаза, полные неизбывной одержимости, жадно смотрят на вас в упор.{/n} "Чувствуешь ли ты этот жар? Это разрывающее изнутри пламя? Эту неутолимую жажду, на мгновение напоенную морем крови? Ты... довол{mf|ен|ьна} мной?"

This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

"You, {name}..." {n}Marazhai can hardly stop himself from reaching out for you — his eyes, full of unrelenting obsession, devour you at close range.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

languages.text: “你，{name}……”{n}玛拉斋无法克制地将手伸向你，他的双眼中满是痴迷，仿佛要从近距离吞噬你一般。{/n}“你有没有感觉到这股热浪？这股从内心深处撕裂你的火焰？你有没有感觉到这种无法满足的饥渴，只有在血海之中才能暂时平息？你……对我还满意吗？”
languages.original_text: "You, {name}..." {n}Marazhai can hardly stop himself from reaching out for you — his eyes, full of unrelenting obsession, devour you at close range.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

traits.locale_text: “你，{name}……”{n}玛拉斋无法克制地将手伸向你，他的双眼中满是痴迷，仿佛要从近距离吞噬你一般。{/n}“你有没有感觉到这股热浪？这股从内心深处撕裂你的火焰？你有没有感觉到这种无法满足的饥渴，只有在血海之中才能暂时平息？你……对我还满意吗？”

languages.text: 「お前、{name}…」{n}マラズハイは無意識にこちらへと手を伸ばす。鋭い執着に満ちた目は、至近距離であなたを飲み込む。{/n}「この熱さを感じるか？内側から突き抜けるこの炎を？満たされない渇きが、血の海で一瞬だけ癒されたあの感覚を？お前は…俺と共に満足できたか？」
languages.original_text: "You, {name}..." {n}Marazhai can hardly stop himself from reaching out for you — his eyes, full of unrelenting obsession, devour you at close range.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前、{name}…」{n}マラズハイは無意識にこちらへと手を伸ばす。鋭い執着に満ちた目は、至近距離であなたを飲み込む。{/n}「この熱さを感じるか？内側から突き抜けるこの炎を？満たされない渇きが、血の海で一瞬だけ癒されたあの感覚を？お前は…俺と共に満足できたか？」

languages.text: «Tú, {name}...». {n}Marazhai apenas puede evitar alargar la mano hacia ti. Sus ojos, llenos de una obsesión incesante, te devoran desde cerca.{/n} «¿Sientes este calor? ¿Esta llama que te desgarra por dentro? ¿Esta sed incontenible, que solo se extingue momentáneamente bajo un mar de sangre? ¿Estás... content{mf|o|a} conmigo?».
languages.original_text: "You, {name}..." {n}Marazhai can hardly stop himself from reaching out for you — his eyes, full of unrelenting obsession, devour you at close range.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

traits.locale_text: «Tú, {name}...». {n}Marazhai apenas puede evitar alargar la mano hacia ti. Sus ojos, llenos de una obsesión incesante, te devoran desde cerca.{/n} «¿Sientes este calor? ¿Esta llama que te desgarra por dentro? ¿Esta sed incontenible, que solo se extingue momentáneamente bajo un mar de sangre? ¿Estás... content{mf|o|a} conmigo?».

languages.text: « Et vous, {name}... » {n}Marazhai ne peut s'empêcher de se rapprocher de vous ; il vous dévore du regard, les yeux brûlant d'une obsession maladive.{/n} « Sentez-vous cette chaleur torride ? Cette flamme qui vous ronge de l'intérieur ? Cette soif inextinguible brièvement assouvie par une déferlante de sang ? Êtes-vous... {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} de mes services ? »
languages.original_text: "You, {name}..." {n}Marazhai can hardly stop himself from reaching out for you — his eyes, full of unrelenting obsession, devour you at close range.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

traits.locale_text: « Et vous, {name}... » {n}Marazhai ne peut s'empêcher de se rapprocher de vous ; il vous dévore du regard, les yeux brûlant d'une obsession maladive.{/n} « Sentez-vous cette chaleur torride ? Cette flamme qui vous ronge de l'intérieur ? Cette soif inextinguible brièvement assouvie par une déferlante de sang ? Êtes-vous... {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} de mes services ? »

languages.text: "Ihr, {name} ..." {n}Marazhai fällt es extrem schwer, sich zurückhalten und nicht nach dir zu greifen – seine Augen offenbaren unnachgiebige Besessenheit und wirken, als wöllten sie dich regelrecht verschlingen.{/n} "Fühlt Ihr diese Hitze? Die Flamme, die Euch von innen heraus zerreißt? Der unstillbare Durst, der nur für einen Augenblick lang durch ein Meer von Blut gelöscht wird? Seid Ihr ... zufrieden mit mir?"
languages.original_text: "You, {name}..." {n}Marazhai can hardly stop himself from reaching out for you — his eyes, full of unrelenting obsession, devour you at close range.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr, {name} ..." {n}Marazhai fällt es extrem schwer, sich zurückhalten und nicht nach dir zu greifen – seine Augen offenbaren unnachgiebige Besessenheit und wirken, als wöllten sie dich regelrecht verschlingen.{/n} "Fühlt Ihr diese Hitze? Die Flamme, die Euch von innen heraus zerreißt? Der unstillbare Durst, der nur für einen Augenblick lang durch ein Meer von Blut gelöscht wird? Seid Ihr ... zufrieden mit mir?

languages.text: "Sen... {name}..." {n}Marazhai, kendini sana yaklaşmaktan güç bela alıkoyabiliyor. Sonu gelmez bir saplantıyla dolu gözleri, seni yakından yiyip bitiriyor.{/n} "O hiddeti hissediyor musun? İçten içe seni parçalayan o alevi, yalnızca bir anlığına bir kan denizinin söndürebileceği o bastırılamayan susuzluğu hissediyor musun? Seni... Memnun edebiliyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: "You, {name}..." {n}Marazhai can hardly stop himself from reaching out for you — his eyes, full of unrelenting obsession, devour you at close range.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Are you... pleased with me?"
